itunes:title: #4: Coping with Anger from Your Past
title: #4: Coping with Anger from Your Past
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: This week, we did into how old anger can negatively affect our self-image, relationships with others, and impact unhealthy coping mechanisms.   We talk about the different "faces" of anger, some of the underlying emotions, and the best first...
itunes:summary:
This week, we did into how old anger can negatively affect our self-image, relationships with others, and impact unhealthy coping mechanisms.

 

We talk about the different "faces" of anger, some of the underlying emotions, and the best first steps you can take to resolve it.

 

 

 SIGN UP FOR THE FREE MASTERCLASS
